[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@thi.ng/api](./api.md) &gt; [SIZEOF](./api.sizeof.md)

## SIZEOF variable

Size information (in bytes) for [Type](./api.type.md) enums. For [GLType](./api.gltype.md)<!-- -->, use this form, e.g. `SIZEOF[GL2TYPE[GLType.F32]]`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
SIZEOF: {
    [Type.U8]: number;
    [Type.U8C]: number;
    [Type.I8]: number;
    [Type.U16]: number;
    [Type.I16]: number;
    [Type.U32]: number;
    [Type.I32]: number;
    [Type.F32]: number;
    [Type.F64]: number;
}
```
